sqlMap.select:
/* Consult.selectVendorInfo */ SELECT BMAN_NO, HND_NM, CEO_NM, BKIND_NM, BTYP_NM, ZIP_NO, SPMN_ADDR_1_NM, SPMN_ADDR_2_NM, UTAKMN_NM, TEL_NO, CELL_NO, EMAIL, REG_DIVN_CD, PWD, CORPN_DIVN_CD, rpad(CORPN_RSDT_NO,13,'0') AS CORPN_RSDT_NO,FOU_YYYY, CAP_AMT, FTRY_TF, MANFC_PRODS_NM, YY_SALE_AMT, MM_SALE_AMT, REG_DATE, ORG_CD, FAX_NO, CORPN_NM, BMAN_KIND_CD, ATCH_FILE_CD, CNSL_RSLT_DIVN_CD, ENTSHP_RSLT_DIVN_CD, ENTSHP_PROC_CONTENT, CHG_STATUS_CD, CORPN_NM, REP_TEL_NO, PWD, AFF_YN, HMPG_ADDR, COM_CHAR_CD, COM_CHAR_ETC_CONTENT, LOTTE_AFF_TRD_CD, LOTTE_AFF_TRD_ETC_CONTENT, PECU_SBJT_CONTENT, SUBSTR(EMAIL,0,INSTR(EMAIL,'@')-1) AS EMAIL1, SUBSTR(EMAIL,INSTR(EMAIL,'@')+1) AS EMAIL2, SUBSTR(ZIP_NO,0,3) AS ZIP_NO1, SUBSTR(ZIP_NO,3,3) AS ZIP_NO2,
RTRIM(SUBSTR(TEL_NO,1,4)) AS TEL_NO1, RTRIM(SUBSTR(TEL_NO,5,4)) AS TEL_NO2, SUBSTR(TEL_NO,9) AS TEL_NO3,
RTRIM(SUBSTR(CELL_NO,1,4)) AS CELL_NO1, RTRIM(SUBSTR(CELL_NO,5,4)) AS CELL_NO2, SUBSTR(CELL_NO,9) AS CELL_NO3,
RTRIM(SUBSTR(FAX_NO,1,4)) AS FAX_NO1, RTRIM(SUBSTR(FAX_NO,5,4)) AS FAX_NO2, SUBSTR(FAX_NO,9) AS FAX_NO3,
RTRIM(SUBSTR(REP_TEL_NO,1,4)) AS REP_TEL_NO1, RTRIM(SUBSTR(REP_TEL_NO,5,4)) AS REP_TEL_NO2, SUBSTR(REP_TEL_NO,9) AS REP_TEL_NO3,
REG_DATE, MOD_DATE,L1_CD, SM_INDUSTRY_ENTP_NM, SM_INDUSTRY_ENTP_PROD_NM, SM_INDUSTRY_ENTP_AMT, TEAM_CD, PAPE_JGM_RSLT_DIVN_CD ,KIND_CD, WISH_STORE,ASIS_MYSTORECNT,T_SUBTEAM_CD,UPLOAD_FOLDER FROM TED_VENDOR_EDI WHERE BMAN_NO = #businessNo#

/* Consult.selectVendorInfoResult */ SELECT BMAN_NO, HND_NM, CEO_NM, BKIND_NM, BTYP_NM, ZIP_NO, SPMN_ADDR_1_NM, SPMN_ADDR_2_NM, UTAKMN_NM, TEL_NO, CELL_NO, EMAIL, REG_DIVN_CD, PWD, CORPN_DIVN_CD, rpad(CORPN_RSDT_NO,13,'0') AS CORPN_RSDT_NO,FOU_YYYY, CAP_AMT, FTRY_TF, MANFC_PRODS_NM, YY_SALE_AMT, MM_SALE_AMT, REG_DATE, ORG_CD, FAX_NO, CORPN_NM, BMAN_KIND_CD, ATCH_FILE_CD, CNSL_RSLT_DIVN_CD, ENTSHP_RSLT_DIVN_CD, ENTSHP_PROC_CONTENT, CHG_STATUS_CD, CORPN_NM, REP_TEL_NO, PWD, AFF_YN, HMPG_ADDR, COM_CHAR_CD, COM_CHAR_ETC_CONTENT, LOTTE_AFF_TRD_CD, LOTTE_AFF_TRD_ETC_CONTENT, PECU_SBJT_CONTENT, SUBSTR(EMAIL,0,INSTR(EMAIL,'@')-1) AS EMAIL1, SUBSTR(EMAIL,INSTR(EMAIL,'@')+1) AS EMAIL2, SUBSTR(ZIP_NO,0,3) AS ZIP_NO1, SUBSTR(ZIP_NO,3,3) AS ZIP_NO2,
RTRIM(SUBSTR(TEL_NO,1,4)) AS TEL_NO1, RTRIM(SUBSTR(TEL_NO,5,4)) AS TEL_NO2, SUBSTR(TEL_NO,9) AS TEL_NO3,
RTRIM(SUBSTR(CELL_NO,1,4)) AS CELL_NO1, RTRIM(SUBSTR(CELL_NO,5,4)) AS CELL_NO2, SUBSTR(CELL_NO,9) AS CELL_NO3,
RTRIM(SUBSTR(FAX_NO,1,4)) AS FAX_NO1, RTRIM(SUBSTR(FAX_NO,5,4)) AS FAX_NO2, SUBSTR(FAX_NO,9) AS FAX_NO3,
RTRIM(SUBSTR(REP_TEL_NO,1,4)) AS REP_TEL_NO1, RTRIM(SUBSTR(REP_TEL_NO,5,4)) AS REP_TEL_NO2, SUBSTR(REP_TEL_NO,9) AS REP_TEL_NO3,
REG_DATE, MOD_DATE,L1_CD, SM_INDUSTRY_ENTP_NM, SM_INDUSTRY_ENTP_PROD_NM, SM_INDUSTRY_ENTP_AMT, TEAM_CD, PAPE_JGM_RSLT_DIVN_CD ,KIND_CD, WISH_STORE,ASIS_MYSTORECNT,T_SUBTEAM_CD,UPLOAD_FOLDER FROM TED_VENDOR_EDI WHERE 1=1 and BMAN_NO = #businessNo# and CHG_STATUS_CD!='0'

/* Consult.selectVendorInfo2 */ SELECT BMAN_NO, HND_NM, CEO_NM, BKIND_NM, BTYP_NM, ZIP_NO, SPMN_ADDR_1_NM, SPMN_ADDR_2_NM, UTAKMN_NM, TEL_NO, CELL_NO, EMAIL, REG_DIVN_CD, PWD, CORPN_DIVN_CD, rpad(CORPN_RSDT_NO,13,'0') AS CORPN_RSDT_NO,FOU_YYYY, CAP_AMT, FTRY_TF, MANFC_PRODS_NM, YY_SALE_AMT, MM_SALE_AMT, A.REG_DATE, ORG_CD, FAX_NO, CORPN_NM, BMAN_KIND_CD, ATCH_FILE_CD, CNSL_RSLT_DIVN_CD, ENTSHP_RSLT_DIVN_CD, ENTSHP_PROC_CONTENT, CHG_STATUS_CD, CORPN_NM, REP_TEL_NO, PWD, AFF_YN, HMPG_ADDR, COM_CHAR_CD, COM_CHAR_ETC_CONTENT, LOTTE_AFF_TRD_CD, LOTTE_AFF_TRD_ETC_CONTENT, PECU_SBJT_CONTENT, SUBSTR(EMAIL,0,INSTR(EMAIL,'@')-1) AS EMAIL1, SUBSTR(EMAIL,INSTR(EMAIL,'@')+1) AS EMAIL2, SUBSTR(ZIP_NO,0,3) AS ZIP_NO1, SUBSTR(ZIP_NO,3,3) AS ZIP_NO2,
RTRIM(SUBSTR(TEL_NO,1,4)) AS TEL_NO1, RTRIM(SUBSTR(TEL_NO,5,4)) AS TEL_NO2, SUBSTR(TEL_NO,9) AS TEL_NO3,
RTRIM(SUBSTR(CELL_NO,1,4)) AS CELL_NO1, RTRIM(SUBSTR(CELL_NO,5,4)) AS CELL_NO2, SUBSTR(CELL_NO,9) AS CELL_NO3,
RTRIM(SUBSTR(FAX_NO,1,4)) AS FAX_NO1, RTRIM(SUBSTR(FAX_NO,5,4)) AS FAX_NO2, SUBSTR(FAX_NO,9) AS FAX_NO3,
RTRIM(SUBSTR(REP_TEL_NO,1,4)) AS REP_TEL_NO1, RTRIM(SUBSTR(REP_TEL_NO,5,4)) AS REP_TEL_NO2, SUBSTR(REP_TEL_NO,9) AS REP_TEL_NO3,
A.REG_DATE, A.MOD_DATE, A.L1_CD, B.TEAM_NM,B.TEAM_CD, B.L1_NM, B.L1_CD, A.SM_INDUSTRY_ENTP_NM, A.SM_INDUSTRY_ENTP_PROD_NM, A.SM_INDUSTRY_ENTP_AMT,A.KIND_CD FROM TED_VENDOR_EDI A, TED_CONSULT_TEAM_L1CD B WHERE BMAN_NO = #businessNo# AND A.TEAM_CD = B.TEAM_CD AND A.L1_CD = B.L1_CD

/* Consult.selectVendorInfoApply2 */ SELECT BMAN_NO, SEQ, COL_VAL, DISP_YN
FROM TED_CONSULT_MYEST_VAL WHERE BMAN_NO = #bmanNo#

/* Consult.selectVendorAnswer */ SELECT BMAN_NO , B.KIND_CD AS KIND_CD , SUBSTR(A.SEQ, 3, 1) AS SEQ , B.QUERY_DESC , COL_VAL FROM TED_CONSULT_MYEST_VAL A , TED_CONSULT_QUEST_LIST B WHERE A.SEQ = B.SEQ AND A.BMAN_NO = #bmanNo#
sqlMap.update: /*Consult.updateNewVendorInfoNew*/ UPDATE TED_CONSULT_MYEST_VAL SET BMAN_NO = #bmanNo#, SEQ = #seq#, QUERY_DESC = '', COL_VAL = #colVal#, DISP_YN = 'Y', REG_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0), REG_ID = '999999999', MOD_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0), MOD_ID = 'EDI' WHERE BMAN_NO = #bmanNo# AND SEQ = #seq#
sqlMap.select:
/* Consult.Consult.selectVendorInfoApply */ SELECT BMAN_NO, HND_NM, CEO_NM, BKIND_NM, BTYP_NM, ZIP_NO, SPMN_ADDR_1_NM, SPMN_ADDR_2_NM, UTAKMN_NM, TEL_NO, CELL_NO, EMAIL, REG_DIVN_CD, PWD, CORPN_DIVN_CD, rpad(CORPN_RSDT_NO,13,'0') AS CORPN_RSDT_NO,FOU_YYYY, CAP_AMT, FTRY_TF, MANFC_PRODS_NM, YY_SALE_AMT, MM_SALE_AMT, A.REG_DATE, ORG_CD, FAX_NO, CORPN_NM, BMAN_KIND_CD, ATCH_FILE_CD, CNSL_RSLT_DIVN_CD, ENTSHP_RSLT_DIVN_CD, ENTSHP_PROC_CONTENT, CHG_STATUS_CD, CORPN_NM, REP_TEL_NO, PWD, AFF_YN, HMPG_ADDR, COM_CHAR_CD, COM_CHAR_ETC_CONTENT, LOTTE_AFF_TRD_CD, LOTTE_AFF_TRD_ETC_CONTENT, PECU_SBJT_CONTENT, SUBSTR(EMAIL,0,INSTR(EMAIL,'@')-1) AS EMAIL1, SUBSTR(EMAIL,INSTR(EMAIL,'@')+1) AS EMAIL2, SUBSTR(ZIP_NO,0,3) AS ZIP_NO1, SUBSTR(ZIP_NO,3,3) AS ZIP_NO2,
RTRIM(SUBSTR(TEL_NO,1,4)) AS TEL_NO1, RTRIM(SUBSTR(TEL_NO,5,4)) AS TEL_NO2, SUBSTR(TEL_NO,9) AS TEL_NO3,
RTRIM(SUBSTR(CELL_NO,1,4)) AS CELL_NO1, RTRIM(SUBSTR(CELL_NO,5,4)) AS CELL_NO2, SUBSTR(CELL_NO,9) AS CELL_NO3,
RTRIM(SUBSTR(FAX_NO,1,4)) AS FAX_NO1, RTRIM(SUBSTR(FAX_NO,5,4)) AS FAX_NO2, SUBSTR(FAX_NO,9) AS FAX_NO3,
RTRIM(SUBSTR(REP_TEL_NO,1,4)) AS REP_TEL_NO1, RTRIM(SUBSTR(REP_TEL_NO,5,4)) AS REP_TEL_NO2, SUBSTR(REP_TEL_NO,9) AS REP_TEL_NO3,
A.REG_DATE, A.MOD_DATE , A.L1_CD ,(select aa.L1_NM from TED_CONSULT_TEAM_L1CD aa where aa.L1_CD=A.L1_CD group by aa.L1_CD,L1_NM ) as L1_NM , C.TEAM_NM,C.TEAM_CD --, B.L1_NM, B.L1_CD, ,A.SM_INDUSTRY_ENTP_NM, A.SM_INDUSTRY_ENTP_PROD_NM, A.SM_INDUSTRY_ENTP_AMT , A.PWD ,A.KIND_CD ,A.WISH_STORE ,A.ASIS_MYSTORECNT ,A.T_SUBTEAM_CD ,A.UPLOAD_FOLDER FROM TED_VENDOR_EDI A left outer join ( select b.TEAM_CD,b.TEAM_NM from TED_CONSULT_TEAMCD b group by b.TEAM_CD,b.TEAM_NM ) c on A.TEAM_CD = c.TEAM_CD WHERE BMAN_NO = #businessNo#

/* Consult.selectNewVendorInfoApply */ SELECT BMAN_NO, HND_NM, CEO_NM, BKIND_NM, BTYP_NM, ZIP_NO, SPMN_ADDR_1_NM, SPMN_ADDR_2_NM, UTAKMN_NM, TEL_NO, CELL_NO, EMAIL, REG_DIVN_CD, PWD, CORPN_DIVN_CD, rpad(CORPN_RSDT_NO,13,'0') AS CORPN_RSDT_NO,FOU_YYYY, CAP_AMT, FTRY_TF, MANFC_PRODS_NM, YY_SALE_AMT, MM_SALE_AMT, A.REG_DATE, ORG_CD, FAX_NO, CORPN_NM, BMAN_KIND_CD, ATCH_FILE_CD, CNSL_RSLT_DIVN_CD, ENTSHP_RSLT_DIVN_CD, ENTSHP_PROC_CONTENT, CHG_STATUS_CD, CORPN_NM, REP_TEL_NO, PWD, AFF_YN, HMPG_ADDR, COM_CHAR_CD, COM_CHAR_ETC_CONTENT, LOTTE_AFF_TRD_CD, LOTTE_AFF_TRD_ETC_CONTENT, PECU_SBJT_CONTENT, SUBSTR(EMAIL,0,INSTR(EMAIL,'@')-1) AS EMAIL1, SUBSTR(EMAIL,INSTR(EMAIL,'@')+1) AS EMAIL2, SUBSTR(ZIP_NO,0,3) AS ZIP_NO1, SUBSTR(ZIP_NO,3,3) AS ZIP_NO2,
RTRIM(SUBSTR(TEL_NO,1,4)) AS TEL_NO1, RTRIM(SUBSTR(TEL_NO,5,4)) AS TEL_NO2, SUBSTR(TEL_NO,9) AS TEL_NO3,
RTRIM(SUBSTR(CELL_NO,1,4)) AS CELL_NO1, RTRIM(SUBSTR(CELL_NO,5,4)) AS CELL_NO2, SUBSTR(CELL_NO,9) AS CELL_NO3,
RTRIM(SUBSTR(FAX_NO,1,4)) AS FAX_NO1, RTRIM(SUBSTR(FAX_NO,5,4)) AS FAX_NO2, SUBSTR(FAX_NO,9) AS FAX_NO3,
RTRIM(SUBSTR(REP_TEL_NO,1,4)) AS REP_TEL_NO1, RTRIM(SUBSTR(REP_TEL_NO,5,4)) AS REP_TEL_NO2, SUBSTR(REP_TEL_NO,9) AS REP_TEL_NO3,
A.REG_DATE, A.MOD_DATE , A.L1_CD ,(select aa.L1_NM from TED_CONSULT_TEAM_L1CD aa where aa.L1_CD=A.L1_CD group by aa.L1_CD,L1_NM ) as L1_NM , C.TEAM_NM,C.TEAM_CD --, B.L1_NM, B.L1_CD, ,A.SM_INDUSTRY_ENTP_NM, A.SM_INDUSTRY_ENTP_PROD_NM, A.SM_INDUSTRY_ENTP_AMT ,KIND_CD,A.WISH_STORE,A.ASIS_MYSTORECNT,A.T_SUBTEAM_CD,A.UPLOAD_FOLDER FROM TED_VENDOR_EDI A left outer join ( select b.TEAM_CD,b.TEAM_NM from TED_CONSULT_TEAMCD b group by b.TEAM_CD,b.TEAM_NM ) c on A.TEAM_CD = c.TEAM_CD WHERE BMAN_NO = #businessNo#
SELECT BMAN_NO, REG_DIVN_CD, PWD, CHG_STATUS_CD, HND_NM, CEO_NM FROM TED_VENDOR_EDI WHERE BMAN_NO = #businessNo#
select count(*) cnt from TED_VENDOR_EDI where bman_no = #businessNo# and CEO_NM = #ceoName# and EMAIL = #email# and PWD is not null

SELECT t.BMAN_NO, t.SM_INDUSTRY_ENTP_CD, t.ENTSHP_STR_CNT , t.NOR_MRGN_RATE, t.EVT_MRGN_RATE, t.PCOST, t.SUBSTN_AMT, t.TRD_TYPE_CONTENT, c.CD_NM FROM TED_INDUSTRY_ENTRY_INFO t LEFT JOIN TET_CODE c ON t.SM_INDUSTRY_ENTP_CD = c.MINOR_CD WHERE t.BMAN_NO=#businessNo# and c.MAJOR_CD='OTH01'

/*Consult.getVendorProductInfo*/ SELECT T.BMAN_NO, T.SEQ , T.SELL_CD , T.PROD_NM, T.PROD_PCOST, T.PROD_SALEPRC, T.MM_AVG_SALE_AMT, T.ATCH_FILE_CD, T.PROD_DESC, T.UPLOAD_FOLDER FROM TED_NEW_COMPANY_PROD_INFO T WHERE T.BMAN_NO=#businessNo# ORDER BY SEQ

/* Consult.getVendorAutionItemInfo*/ select (SELECT BMAN_NO FROM TED_ENTAU_ITEM_VENDOR AA WHERE AA.BMAN_NO=#bmanNo# AND AA.PROD_SEQS=B.PROD_SEQS ) AS BMAN_NO, B.PROD_SEQS, B.AU_DY, B.L1_CD, B.L1_NM, B.PROD_NM, B.UNIT, B.START_PRC, B.QTY, B.DETL_CONTENT from TED_ENTAU_ITEM B
where B.USE_YN='Y' and B.L1_CD=#l1Cd# AND AU_DY BETWEEN TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0)+1,'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0)+60,'YYYYMMDD') order by B.AU_DY ASC

/*Consult.getVendorAutionItemInfoSum*/ select A.BMAN_NO, B.PROD_SEQS, B.AU_DY, B.L1_CD, B.L1_NM, B.PROD_NM, B.UNIT, B.START_PRC, B.QTY, B.DETL_CONTENT from TED_ENTAU_ITEM_VENDOR A right outer join TED_ENTAU_ITEM B on A.PROD_SEQS=B.PROD_SEQS where B.USE_YN='Y' and B.L1_CD in ( select L1_CD from TED_VENDOR_EDI where BMAN_NO = #businessNo# ) and BMAN_NO = #businessNo# AND AU_DY BETWEEN TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0)+1,'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0)+60,'YYYYMMDD') order by B.AU_DY ASC
sqlMap.update: /*Consult.updateVendorPassword*/ UPDATE TED_VENDOR_EDI SET PWD = #password# ,MOD_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) WHERE BMAN_NO = #businessNo#
sqlMap.insert: /*Consult.insertNewVendorInfo*/ INSERT INTO TED_VENDOR_EDI ( CORPN_DIVN_CD, BMAN_NO, BMAN_KIND_CD, HND_NM, CORPN_RSDT_NO, CORPN_NM, BKIND_NM, BTYP_NM, FAX_NO, ZIP_NO, SPMN_ADDR_1_NM, SPMN_ADDR_2_NM, UTAKMN_NM, CELL_NO, EMAIL, TEL_NO, REP_TEL_NO, CEO_NM, HMPG_ADDR, AFF_YN, ORG_CD, REG_DIVN_CD, REG_DATE, CHG_STATUS_CD, PWD, FOU_YYYY, PAPE_JGM_RSLT_DIVN_CD, CNSL_RSLT_DIVN_CD, ENTSHP_RSLT_DIVN_CD,L1_CD ) VALUES ( #corpnDivnCd#, #bmanNo#, #bmanKindCd#, #hndNm#, #corpnRsdtNo#, #corpnNm#, #businessKind#, #businessType#, rpad(#fax1#,4,' ')||rpad(#fax2#,4,' ')||rpad(#fax3#,4,' '), #zipNo#, #supplyAddr1#, #supplyAddr2#, #utakmanNm#, rpad(#cell1#,4,' ')||rpad(#cell2#,4,' ')||rpad(#cell3#,4,' '), #email#, rpad(#tel1#,4,' ')||rpad(#tel2#,4,' ')||rpad(#tel3#,4,' '), rpad(#officetel1#,4,' ')||rpad(#officetel2#,4,' ')||rpad(#officetel3#,4,' '), #ceoNm#, #homePageAddress#, #affYn#, #orgCd#, #regDivnCd#, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0), #chgStatusCd#, #passwd# , #foundationYear#, 'M' , 'M', 'M',#l1Cd# )
sqlMap.update: /*Consult.updateVendorSaleInfo*/ UPDATE TED_VENDOR_EDI SET FOU_YYYY = #foundationYear#, CAP_AMT = #capitalAmount#, FTRY_TF = #factoryType#, MANFC_PRODS_NM = #mainProduct#, YY_SALE_AMT = #yearSaleAmount#, MM_SALE_AMT = #monthSaleAmount#, COM_CHAR_CD = #companyCharCode#, COM_CHAR_ETC_CONTENT = #companyDescription#, LOTTE_AFF_TRD_CD = #lotteAffTradeCode#, LOTTE_AFF_TRD_ETC_CONTENT = #lotteAffTradeContent#, SM_INDUSTRY_ENTP_NM = #smIndustryEntpNm#, SM_INDUSTRY_ENTP_PROD_NM = #smIndustryEntpProdNm#, SM_INDUSTRY_ENTP_AMT = #smIndustryEntpAmt#, MOD_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) WHERE BMAN_NO = #bmanNo#
sqlMap.select: /*Consult.getVendorOtherStoreSaleInfoCount*/ SELECT count(BMAN_NO) FROM TED_INDUSTRY_ENTRY_INFO WHERE BMAN_NO=#businessNo# and SM_INDUSTRY_ENTP_CD=#otherStoreCode#
sqlMap.insert: /*Consult.insertOtherStoreVendorSaleInfo*/ INSERT INTO TED_INDUSTRY_ENTRY_INFO ( ENTSHP_STR_CNT, NOR_MRGN_RATE, EVT_MRGN_RATE, PCOST, SUBSTN_AMT, TRD_TYPE_CONTENT, BMAN_NO, SM_INDUSTRY_ENTP_CD, REG_DATE ) VALUES ( #enteredStoreCount#, #marginRate1#, #marginRate2#, #pcost#, #subAmount#, #tradeTypeContent#, #businessNo#, #otherStoreCode#, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) )
sqlMap.update: /*Consult.updateOtherStoreVendorSaleInfo*/ UPDATE TED_INDUSTRY_ENTRY_INFO SET ENTSHP_STR_CNT = #enteredStoreCount#, NOR_MRGN_RATE = #marginRate1#, EVT_MRGN_RATE = #marginRate2#, PCOST = #pcost#, SUBSTN_AMT = #subAmount#, MOD_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0), TRD_TYPE_CONTENT = #tradeTypeContent# WHERE BMAN_NO=#businessNo# and SM_INDUSTRY_ENTP_CD=#otherStoreCode#

/*Consult.updateVendorProductContentApply*/ UPDATE TED_VENDOR_EDI SET PECU_SBJT_CONTENT = #pecuSubjectContent#, REG_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0)
ATCH_FILE_CD = #attachFileCode#
UPLOAD_FOLDER = #uploadFolder#
WHERE BMAN_NO = #bmanNo#
/* Consult.updateVendorProductContentApplySupport*/ UPDATE TED_VENDOR_EDI SET PECU_SBJT_CONTENT = #pecuSubjectContent#, REG_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) WHERE BMAN_NO = #bmanNo#
sqlMap.select: /*Consult.getVendorProductInfoCount*/ SELECT count(BMAN_NO) FROM TED_NEW_COMPANY_PROD_INFO WHERE BMAN_NO = #businessNo# and SEQ = #seq#
sqlMap.insert: /*Consult.insertVendorProductInfo*/ INSERT INTO TED_NEW_COMPANY_PROD_INFO ( PROD_NM , PROD_PCOST , PROD_SALEPRC , PROD_DESC , REG_DATE , MM_AVG_SALE_AMT , ATCH_FILE_CD , BMAN_NO , SEQ , SELL_CD ) VALUES ( #productName#, #productCost#, #productSalePrice#, #productDescription#, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0), #monthlyAverage#, #attachFileCode#, #businessNo#, #seq#, #sellCode# )

/*Consult.insertVendorProductInfoApply*/ INSERT INTO TED_NEW_COMPANY_PROD_INFO ( PROD_NM , REG_DATE , ATCH_FILE_CD , BMAN_NO , SEQ , UPLOAD_FOLDER ) VALUES ( #productName#, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0), #attachFileCode#, #businessNo#, #seq#, #atchFileFolder# )
sqlMap.update:
/*Consult.updateVendorProductInfoApply*/ UPDATE TED_NEW_COMPANY_PROD_INFO SET PROD_NM = #productName#,
MOD_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0)
ATCH_FILE_CD = #attachFileCode#
UPLOAD_FOLDER = #atchFileFolder#
WHERE BMAN_NO = #businessNo# and SEQ = #seq#

/*Consult.updateVendorInfoFinalStep*/ UPDATE TED_VENDOR_EDI SET CHG_STATUS_CD = 1, REG_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) , PAPE_JGM_RSLT_DIVN_CD = 'M' , PAPE_JGM_RETN_DIVN_CD = '' , PAPE_JGM_UTAKMN_TEL_NO = '' , PAPE_JGM_PROC_CONTENT = '' , PAPE_JGM_PROC_DY = '' , CNSL_RSLT_DIVN_CD = 'M' , CNSL_RETN_DIVN_CD = '' , CNSL_UTAKMN_TEL_NO = '' , CNSL_PROC_CONTENT = '' , CNSL_PROC_DY = '' , ENTSHP_RSLT_DIVN_CD = 'M' , ENTSHP_RETN_DIVN_CD = '' , ENTSHP_UTAKMN_TEL_NO = '' , ENTSHP_PROC_CONTENT = '' , ENTSHP_PROC_DY = '' WHERE BMAN_NO = #bmanNo#

/*Consult.updateVendorInfoFinalStepApply*/ UPDATE TED_VENDOR_EDI SET CHG_STATUS_CD = 1, REG_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) , PAPE_JGM_RSLT_DIVN_CD = 'M' , PAPE_JGM_RETN_DIVN_CD = '' , PAPE_JGM_UTAKMN_TEL_NO = '' , PAPE_JGM_PROC_CONTENT = '' , PAPE_JGM_PROC_DY = '' , CNSL_RSLT_DIVN_CD = 'M' , CNSL_RETN_DIVN_CD = '' , CNSL_UTAKMN_TEL_NO = '' , CNSL_PROC_CONTENT = '' , CNSL_PROC_DY = '' , ENTSHP_RSLT_DIVN_CD = 'M' , ENTSHP_RETN_DIVN_CD = '' , ENTSHP_UTAKMN_TEL_NO = '' , ENTSHP_PROC_CONTENT = '' , ENTSHP_PROC_DY = '' , PWD = #passwd# WHERE BMAN_NO = #bmanNo#

/*Consult.updateVendorInfoConsultResult*/ UPDATE TED_VENDOR_EDI SET CHG_STATUS_CD = 1, REG_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0), PAPE_JGM_RSLT_DIVN_CD = 'M', PAPE_JGM_RETN_DIVN_CD = NULL, PAPE_JGM_UTAKMN_TEL_NO = NULL, PAPE_JGM_UTAKMN_NM = NULL, PAPE_JGM_PROC_CONTENT = NULL, PAPE_JGM_PROC_DY = NULL, CNSL_RSLT_DIVN_CD = 'M', CNSL_RETN_DIVN_CD = NULL, CNSL_UTAKMN_TEL_NO = NULL
WHERE BMAN_NO = #bmanNo#

/*Consult.updateVendorInfoConsultResultApply*/ UPDATE TED_VENDOR_EDI SET CHG_STATUS_CD = 1, REG_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0), PAPE_JGM_RSLT_DIVN_CD = 'M', PAPE_JGM_RETN_DIVN_CD = NULL, PAPE_JGM_UTAKMN_TEL_NO = NULL, PAPE_JGM_UTAKMN_NM = NULL, PAPE_JGM_PROC_CONTENT = NULL, PAPE_JGM_PROC_DY = NULL, CNSL_RSLT_DIVN_CD = 'M', CNSL_RETN_DIVN_CD = NULL, CNSL_UTAKMN_TEL_NO = NULL, PWD = #passwd# WHERE BMAN_NO = #bmanNo#
sqlMap.select: /* Consult.getResultInfo */ SELECT BMAN_NO,HND_NM, CHG_STATUS_CD, TO_CHAR(REG_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DATE, NVL(PAPE_JGM_RSLT_DIVN_CD,'M') AS PAPE_JGM_RSLT_DIVN_CD, PAPE_JGM_RETN_DIVN_CD, PAPE_JGM_PROC_CONTENT, NVL(CNSL_RSLT_DIVN_CD, 'M') AS CNSL_RSLT_DIVN_CD, CNSL_RETN_DIVN_CD, CNSL_PROC_CONTENT, NVL(ENTSHP_RSLT_DIVN_CD, 'M') AS ENTSHP_RSLT_DIVN_CD, ENTSHP_RETN_DIVN_CD, ENTSHP_PROC_CONTENT, DECODE(PAPE_JGM_PROC_DY,'','',PAPE_JGM_PROC_DY) AS PAPE_JGM_PROC_DY, DECODE(CNSL_PROC_DY,'','',CNSL_PROC_DY) AS CNSL_PROC_DY, DECODE(ENTSHP_PROC_DY,'','',ENTSHP_PROC_DY) AS ENTSHP_PROC_DY FROM TED_VENDOR_EDI WHERE BMAN_NO = #businessNo#
/*Consult.resultClass*/ SELECT PAPE_JGM_RSLT_DIVN_CD, CNSL_RSLT_DIVN_CD, ENTSHP_RSLT_DIVN_CD FROM TED_VENDOR_EDI WHERE BMAN_NO = #businessNo#
sqlMap.insert:
/* Consult.insertNewVendorInfoNew*/
INSERT INTO TED_VENDOR_EDI ( BMAN_NO ,PWD ,TEAM_CD ,REG_DATE ) VALUES ( #businessNo# ,#password# ,#teamCode# ,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) )
